name: The Bouqs Co.
title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Node and PHP API development. Creating AWS based automated testing and deployment systems. 95% remote with occasional office meetings.
responsibilities: Identify security requirements for API and backend services.
Automating the testing and deploy process.
Implementing performance monitoring, reporting and and alerting.
Review developers' code for architecture, security and standards.
AWS systems architecture, implementation and troubleshooting.
accomplishments: Refactored an ES6 async/await application while learning ES6.
Created a PHP API rooted in Swaggwer that wrapped and stabilized the existing ecommerce platform through its largest growth.
Implemented 90%+ test coverage in new code using Mocha, Jest and Postman.
learnings: I improved at adapting quickly to changes in plans and process.
I was able to hone my AWS automation and deployment skills.
My belief that technology should be involved in the product development process was affirmed.
reasonLeft: My PHP/Node development position was eliminated as the company moved to Ruby on Rails.
